segments.text: I'm shocked by the overflowing sink in this quiet kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water just keeps pouring out, unchecked and wild.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, but totally zoned out on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the waterâ€”how hasn't she felt that yet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy, wow, climbing so high on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks so unsteady, tilting back dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies with such focus amid the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, part of this sneaky operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such mischief in such a normal setting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a peaceful garden, totally contrasting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene caught me off guard completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What will happen if no one stops this?
segments.speaker: PAR
